Address.label: Address
Address.value: 2005 MARKET STREET,39TH FLOOR, ONE COMMERCE SQUARE, PHILADELPHIA, Pennsylvania, 19103, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Passage Bio Inc is a genetic medicines company. The company is focused on developing transformative therapies for rare, monogenic CNS disorders. It has pipeline products such as GM1 Gangliosidosis, Frontotemporal dementia, and Krabbe Disease.
